    My Personal Portfolio

    "Always go forward whatever it takes" - this is my moto and I strive to become part of something that changes the world. Currently working in the banking IT industry making a banking software for the USA

    Learn More

    Projects

    The VTU administration needed more modern software for managing their work so me and a friend of mine did this system for them. I did the back-end architecture by using DDD and making sure that all SOLID principles are being followed. As a database we use MSSQL Server and EF Core 5 as an ORM.

    Stack
    • ASP .NET CORE 5 WebAPI
    • React
    • EF Core 5
    • MSSQL
      CodeSource

    An app which currently is not deployed anywhere. It is using a basic ASP .NET Core API and React with bootstrap as a UI framework. The purpose of this project was to learn React and this project has been assigned with 6.00 from the tutors at the university

    Stack
    • React
    • JavaScript
    • Typescript
    • ASP .NET Core
      CodeSource

    This is a project where I made online preparation for the exams for the 12th graders. I used Blazor-Server-Side for making the project and it had 200+ users registerd. As a utility project I also did a pdf reader which scraped the questions and answers from a pdf and produces an excel file with all the data which is later being imported directly into the system.

    Stack
    • Blazor
    • ASP NET 5
    • C#
